description: This file defines a Java interface for a Note service within a notes application. It declares methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, providing an abstraction for note management operations.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: A Java interface specifying the contract for note management functionalities such as create, find, update, and delete operations.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note based on the provided request.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID, if it exists.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID with new data.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note with the specified ID.
